comment: You can find the existing scene using either oldId to lookup the old scene_id or oldUrl to find using the old scene_url.
You can specify a newId for the new scene_id and and newUrl to update the scene_url
If you do not specify a newId, just the sceneUrl will be updated
Set flag_scene_for_rescrape to true to flag scenes to be rescraped next time scrappers are run, this is useful to refresh other field values, eg images, trailers, etc
If you you are overwriting a standard mapping file, leave custom_mappings set to false
